mapper.select: SELECT BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , ATFL_MNG_ID , FILE_RGS_DSCD , SQNO , FILE_PATH , FILE_NM , RMRMK , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_TS FROM pms_atfl_mng WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , GRP_TYCD , GRP_TYMM , GRID_COLM_NM1 , GRID_COLM_NM2 , GRID_COLM_NM3 , GRID_COLM_NM4 , GRID_COLM_NM5 , GRID_COLM_NM6 , GRID_COLM_NM7 , GRID_COLM_NM8 , GRID_COLM_NM9 , GRID_COLM_NM10 , GRID_COLM_NM11 , GRID_COLM_NM12 , GRID_COLM_NM13 , GRID_COLM_NM14 , GRID_COLM_NM15 , GRID_COLM_NM16 , GRID_COLM_NM17 , GRID_COLM_NM18 , GRID_COLM_NM19 , GRID_COLM_NM20 , SORT_SEQ , USG_YN , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_NO FROM pms_cd_mng WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , GRP_TYCD , DTLS_TYCD , DTLS_TYNM , ETC_TXT1 , ETC_TXT2 , ETC_TXT3 , ETC_TXT4 , ETC_TXT5 , ETC_TXT6 , ETC_TXT7 , ETC_TXT8 , DTL_TXT1 , DTL_TXT2 , DTL_TXT3 , DTL_TXT4 , DTL_TXT5 , DTL_TXT6 , DTL_TXT7 , DTL_TXT8 , DTL_TXT9 , DTL_TXT10 , SORT_SEQ , USE_YN , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_TS FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE 1 = 1
